title: Wanted N300 Brouthers (Louisville), Corcoran, Delahanty, Russie (mispelled).

posts.post_title: Wanted N300 Brouthers (Louisville), Corcoran, Delahanty, Russie (mispelled).
posts.post_content:
Wanted N300's to buy or trade (lots of cards to trade including N300's).  Most any condition without major paper loss will do.

Brouthers-Louisville
Corcoran
Delahanty
Russie-incorrect spelling

Thanks,
Mike
